title: DDFP 387: Week 2 picks, Greg Olsen & Nate Burleson
itunes:title: DDFP 387: Week 2 picks, Greg Olsen & Nate Burleson
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank and Elliot Harrison for a week 2 edition of "Red Challenge flag picks!" Panthers tight end Greg Olsen then comes onto DDFP to kibitz about Carolina's win over Jacksonville and his teammates Cam Newton and Luke Kuechly. Lastly, Nate Burleson joins Shek to wrap the show by giving his best pregame speech. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
